To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AverageDirectionalMovementIndexRating _adxr;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_adxr = ADXR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_adxr.IsReady)
{
    var aDX = _adxr.ADX.Value;
    var current = _adxr.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.adxr = self.ADXR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.adxr.IsReady:
    a_d_x = self.adxr.ADX.Value
    current = self.adxr.Current.Value
